content: this is a crochet pattern not a finished product you will receive a pdf file with step-by-step instructions on how to make the amber blanket scarf with a photo and video tutorial available as an instant download size one size skill level beginner the pattern uses standard american terms yarn 4 skeins of worsted weight yarn lion brand heartland - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - please note that all of these patterns can be found for free with ads on my blog here http //www cjdesignblog com/ - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - returns/refunds there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - i would love to see your finished products tag me on instagram @cj dsgn and use hashtag #theamberscarf resell finished product with pattern credit © 2022 cj design all rights reserved
